scripts.build:js: ./node_modules/.bin/browserify src/js/app.js -o dist/app.min.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -p [ minifyify --no-map --uglify ]
scripts.build:css: node-sass --output-style compressed --include-path src/scss --include-path node_modules/font-awesome/scss src/scss/index.scss dist/app.min.css
scripts.dev:css: node-sass --sourceMap server/app.min.css.map --include-path src/scss --include-path node_modules/font-awesome/scss src/scss/index.scss server/app.min.css
scripts.build:assets: cp -r src/fonts dist & cp node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/* dist/fonts & cp -r src/images dist
scripts.dev:assets: cp -r src/fonts server & cp node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/* server/fonts & cp -r src/images server
scripts.dev: npm run dev:js & npm run dev:css & npm run dev:html & npm run dev:assets
scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist && mkdir dist && npm run build:js & npm run build:css & npm run build:html & npm run build:assets & PORT=80 PROD=1 node start.js
scripts.watch: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:html & npm run watch:js
scripts.start: npm run clean && sleep 2 && npm run dev & npm run watch & node start.js
